"Tucano": "Great, glad to have you on board."
"Are you familiar with the Regional Mags? They're those huge, Mag-shaped structures scattered throughout Retem."
"We used to have volunteers go out to maintain them regularly, but the DOLLS attacks have been brutal lately..."
"Nobody's been able to get out there and check on them in a while, so I'm a little worried. I hope they haven't been damaged..."
"That's why I'd like you to go and check on them for me. I'm counting on you."
